caption.center: GORDON CHARLES SNYDER, APPELLANT (DEFENDANT BELOW), v. THE STATE OF WYOMING,

opinion.posture: Appeal from the District Court of Sheridan County; John P. Ilsley, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Robert J. Oberst, Sheridan, for appellant.
James E. Barrett, Atty. Gen., Jack Speight, Asst. Atty. Gen., James N. Wolfe, Deputy County Atty., Cheyenne, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before HARNSBERGER, C.J., and GRAY, McINTYRE and PARKER, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
The defendant, Gordon Snyder, was convicted of the crime of grand larceny and appeals. The judgment and sentence below is affirmed by an equally divided court.
Page 160
